summary: Implements the family of Residual Networks (ResNet) for image classification, offering configurable depths such as 18, 34, 50, 101, and 152 layers, each with predefined parameter counts and designed for 224×224 input images.
business_intent: Provides a ready-to-use deep convolutional model that can be integrated into computer‑vision pipelines to achieve state‑of‑the‑art accuracy on image recognition tasks, supporting fine‑tuning or inference in production systems.
